text: Buckley Claypits and Commons is a Site of Special Scientific Interest in the preserved county of Clwyd, north Wales. It is an important reserve for the great crested newt.https://www.naturalresources.wales/media/671740/Deeside_and_Buckley_WES32_Plan_English.pdf ==See also== *List of Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Clwyd ==References== Category:Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Clwyd
title: Buckley Claypits and Commons
